title: A review on development and modification strategies of MOFs Z-scheme heterojunction for photocatalytic wastewater treatment, water splitting, and DFT calculations
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Narges Elmi Fard, Nisreen S. Ali, Noori M. Cata Saady, Talib M. Albayati, Issam K. Salih, Sohrab Zendehboudi, Hamed N. Harharah, Ramzi H. Harharah
